reviewText: This game was terrible. I played it for about five minutes and decided I'd rather stick a fork in my eye. The controls are difficult at best, and convoluted at worst, please do not support this company by buying a game that feels like Shaq-Fu met with Gladiator. Thank you.

reviewText:
Uhm, this is hard for me! I think this is an attempt to scam succeeded very well! When I saw this game I was happy, fights between gladiators with lots of splatter and different characters to customize, a dream come true!

These are the reasons why I don't recommend buying it:
- We have just 2 options for the graphic (resolution and true/false) and in game we can't change nothing, from the screenshots it looks nice, but in-game it looks like a bad game for ps2. We know that the beauty of a game doesn't depend on graphics, so let me explain why this game sucks.
- Mechanics are repetitive and always the same (attack, strong attack, special move, final move and no other combo!)
- You can only play online and no one plays, I bought a game where I can only play with bots, wow nice.
- My nickname is my pc name? Are you serious?

I changed the characters, I did 3 games against bots and now I am going to uninstall the game. One of the most boring games I've played.

reviewText:
What to call this game? A weird fighting game with no intro? A beat-em-up with your buddies? A cry for help from the developers? Yep

Pro:
Fun in a thrown into a pit with a bunch of insane killers with no clue on what to do type of game
Strange in a fun way
Variety of options
Low system specs
Steam cards & achieves
Single & multi player (beat the crap out of your buddies)
Can be found in bundles

Con:
A FREAKING INTO WOULD BE NICE !
Overpriced
4 other people on the planet play it
Unbalanced

Overall:
5/10 (-1 price, -1 unbalanced, -1 no demo - intro - training, +1 fun, +1 weird) = 4/10

If your looking for a weird fighter and want to put a lot of time in to get to know the game, and have some budies that want to do that as well .... this is a great fun WTF is going on type of game.  If your just looking to get some punches in on a buddy in a legally acceptable way this is not what your looking for.

This needs a thumbs sideways rating, but that's not an option.

Do I like it?   Yes
Will I play it again?  Yes
Will I put the time in I need to to get good at this game?  No
Would I tell a buddy to pay full price for this game?  F No

So I guess it's thumbs down. But try it out i you can find it cheap or in a bundle.

reviewText: Warning: This game is way over-priced and there is no online community to play against. However, me and my friends bought it in a bundle and it is a blast to play together. It gets boring quite fast but in short bursts it's a fun time-filler between other games. If you can find it cheap and have friends to play against then it's not too bad, but I wouldn't buy it without those conditions.
